description: A large, trench-coated figure wearing a hat and sunglasses stands before an open door, presenting a flyer or book to a lanky, bespectacled man. The item promotes an offer to 'double your IQ or no money back!' The man receiving the offer, despite its inherently absurd nature, readily accepts it, suggesting a lack of critical thinking or a surreal willingness to embrace the impossible. This highlights the irony of someone needing their IQ doubled accepting such an offer so easily.
caption: “Well, I dunno. ... Okay, sounds good to me.”

other_text.location: Top right corner of the panel
Top left corner of the panel

other_text.text: DOUBLE YOUR IQ OR NO MONEY BACK!
